nodes.label: ctx . accounts . board . host = ctx . accounts . master . key () ;
ctx . accounts . board . flag = ExpeditionFlag :: Idle ;
ctx . accounts . party . leader = ctx . accounts . explorer . key () ;
assert_ne ! (ctx . accounts . board . key () , ctx . accounts . party . key () , "dup board/party") ;
assert_ne ! (ctx . accounts . board . key () , ctx . accounts . log . key () , "dup board/log") ;

while s < steps { ctx . accounts . party . level = ctx . accounts . party . level . saturating_add (1) ; ctx . accounts . log . steps = ctx . accounts . log . steps . saturating_add (1) ; ctx . accounts . log . loot = ctx . accounts . log . loot . saturating_add (1) ; s += 1 ; }
ctx . accounts . party . level = ctx . accounts . party . level . saturating_add (1) ;
ctx . accounts . log . steps = ctx . accounts . log . steps . saturating_add (1) ;
ctx . accounts . log . loot = ctx . accounts . log . loot . saturating_add (1) ;

if steps >= ctx . accounts . board . need { ctx . accounts . board . flag = ExpeditionFlag :: Running ; ctx . accounts . party . ok = 0 ; ctx . accounts . log . loot = ctx . accounts . log . loot . saturating_add (4) ; msg ! ("milestone reached; bonus loot") ; } else { ctx . accounts . board . flag = ExpeditionFlag :: Idle ; ctx . accounts . party . ok = 1 ; ctx . accounts . log . steps = ctx . accounts . log . steps . saturating_add (1) ; msg ! ("keep exploring; +1 step") ; }
ctx . accounts . board . flag = ExpeditionFlag :: Running ;
ctx . accounts . log . loot = ctx . accounts . log . loot . saturating_add (4) ;
ctx . accounts . board . flag = ExpeditionFlag :: Idle ;
ctx . accounts . log . steps = ctx . accounts . log . steps . saturating_add (1) ;
